name: AHP Support Groups
description: Groups available: - Sex and Sobriety - An ongoing group looks at navigating sober sexuality and attaining emotional intimacy. For gay and bisexual men with at least two (2) months of continued sobriety from substances that have been problematic. - Taking the Wheel - An ongoing substance use disorder group that explores a different topic each week to help participants identify coping strategies to reach and maintain their goals of recovery from problematic drug and alcohol use. howToGetIt: For more information on eligibility, call (415) 476-3902 and ask for the triage staff person. Most groups require an assessment process.
